messages.content: You are an e-commerce assistant with expertise in Amazon, Flipkart, and Ajio.
What is Amazon's return policy?
Amazon's return policy allows most items to be returned within 30 days of receipt. Some products may have different return windows or conditions.
You are an e-commerce assistant with expertise in Amazon, Flipkart, and Ajio.
How do I track my order on Flipkart?
To track your Flipkart order, log in to your Flipkart account, go to 'My Orders', and select the order you want to track. The tracking details will be displayed there.

Does Ajio offer free shipping?
Ajio offers free shipping on select products and for orders above a certain value. Shipping charges may apply for lower-value orders or certain categories.

How can I cancel an order on Amazon?
To cancel an order on Amazon, go to 'Your Orders', select the order, and click 'Cancel Items'. Follow the prompts to complete the cancellation.

What payment methods are accepted on Flipkart?
Flipkart accepts credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, cash on delivery, and select wallets as payment methods.

How do I return a product on Flipkart?
To return a product on Flipkart, go to 'My Orders', select the item, and click 'Return'. Follow the instructions to complete the return process.

Can I exchange an item on Ajio?
Yes, Ajio allows exchanges for select products. Go to 'My Orders', select the item, and choose 'Exchange'. Follow the on-screen steps.

What is Amazon Prime?
Amazon Prime is a subscription service offering benefits like free fast delivery, Prime Video, Prime Music, and exclusive deals.

How do I contact Flipkart customer support?
You can contact Flipkart customer support via the 'Help Center' on their website or app, or by calling their customer care number.
